channel.title: LostCozmos
channel.description:
[center][font=arial black][size=24pt]LostCozmos [/size][/font][/center] [center][b][u][font=arial black][size=18pt]ALPHA[/size][/font][/u][/b][/center] [center]Made By [b]Cloudwarrior[/b][/center]
[center][size=12pt][b]:Info:[/b][/size][/center] [center]This server is a remake of Cozmoscape. I have been developing this server and I am going to make it just like Cozmoscape was.[/center]
[center]19 Skills are currently trainable.[/center] [center]Custom Items Such as:[/center] [center]Vesta Longsword[/center] [center]Vesta Spear[/center] [center]Statius Hammer[/center] [center]Dual Kunai Swords[/center] [center]And More![/center] [center]Skillcapes(emotions broken atm)[/center] [center]Barrows[/center] [center]Jad[/center] [center]Pest Control[/center] [center]Assault[/center] [center]FunkPK (located at home)[/center] [center]and much more![/center]
Update Sept 27, 2013 Added ::pkbox Added ::pkarena (Whole new area!) Fixed a bunch of bugs Made it feel a little more like Cozmoscape Change slayer exp rate to make it faster.
[center][b]:Skills:[/b][/center]
[center][table][tr][td]Agility[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Attack[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Cooking[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Crafting[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Defence[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Farming[/td][td]0%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Fletching[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Firemaking[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Fishing[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Hitpoints[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Herblore[/td][td]0%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Magic[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Mining[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Prayer[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Range[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Runecrafting[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Slayer[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Smithing[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Strength[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Thieving[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][tr][td]Woodcutting[/td][td]100%[/td][/tr][/table] [/center] [center]:Video:[/center] [center][youtube]http://youtu.be/CXcC0zJjH0s[/youtube][/center]
[center]:Links:[/center] [center]Webclient - Not Currently Available [/center] [center]Client - [url=http://uppit.com/elacwsoo69gt/LostCoz_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/elacwsoo69gt/LostCoz_Client.rar[/url][/center]
[center]:Credits:[/center] [center]Design - Cozmoscape[/center] [center]Programing - Me[/center]

item.title: LostCozmos
item.dc:creator: @Lapper Lapper
item.description:
@Lapper wrote:

Those are normal drag weapons but the client im currently using has the models different than the normal ones.

Many features not yet added and it’s a remake of a server that never used “new” features.

(updated September 28th, 2013)

Read full topic

item.title: LostCozmos
item.dc:creator: @Lapper Lapper
item.description:
@Lapper wrote:

[center][font=arial black][size=24pt]LostCozmos
[/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=arial black][size=18pt]ALPHA[/size][/font][/center]
centerMade By Cloudwarrior[/center]

[center][size=12pt]:Info:[/size][/center]
centerThis server is a remake of Cozmoscape. I have been developing this server and I am going to make it just like Cozmoscape was.[/center]

center19 Skills are currently trainable.[/center]
centerCustom Items Such as:[/center]
centerVesta Longsword[/center]
centerVesta Spear[/center]
centerStatius Hammer[/center]
centerDual Kunai Swords[/center]
centerAnd More![/center]
centerSkillcapes(emotions broken atm)[/center]
centerBarrows[/center]
centerJad[/center]
centerPest Control[/center]
centerAssault[/center]
centerFunkPK (located at home)[/center]
centerand much more![/center]

Update Sept 27, 2013
Added ::pkbox
Added ::pkarena (Whole new area!)
Fixed a bunch of bugs
Made it feel a little more like Cozmoscape
Change slayer exp rate to make it faster.
